lead_paragraph: SKEIE--Andrew Francis, 72, a lifelong resident of Rutherford, NJ, passed away on May 7, 2016. Andrew served in the U.S. Navy during the Vietnam War. For over 25 years, he worked for The New York Times Delivery in Edison and retired as the Floorman in the delivery department with the Drivers Union. Prior, he was a bartender at the Cornerstone Inn in Carlstadt and the Wayne Manor. Beloved husband of the late Elizabeth B. (nee Pittari) Skeie. Loving father of Meredith M. Robinson and her husband Daniel. Cherished grandfather of Brigid, Katherine, Patrick, Eliza and Harley. Funeral departing from the Kimak Funeral Home, 425 Broad St., Carlstadt, NJ on Thursday, May 12, 9am for a Funeral Mass in Assumption Church, Wood-Ridge, NJ at 9:30am. Cremation will be private. Visitation Wednesday 2-4pm, 7-9pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SKEIE, ANDREW FRANCIS
